channel.title: Posts on e-Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on e-Magazine

item.title: Blessings From Baba
item.description: Sai is the embodiment of divine bliss, ultimate bliss and supreme wisdom. He is beyond duality and is all pervasive and the destination of all paths. He is one without a second and permanent. Mantra - Blessings From Baba

item.title: Love Is All You Need
item.description: Mandala Art with a concept of love. Swami was my inspiration and the colours were from the idea of colourful life. Colours describe joyfulness and happiness in one’s life. Mandala Art is something I’ve learn to be patience and manage my emotions. Thank you Gallery

item.title: The Divine Lullaby
item.description: The story of Queen Madālasā is in Chapters 25-30 of the Mārkaṇḍeya Purāṇa. The Mārkaṇḍeya is one of the eighteen ‘great Purāṇas’ (Mahāpurāṇas) relating to Brahmā, said to have been narrated by the Riṛṣi Mārkaṇḍeya. In this mythological tale, Queen Madālasā’s newborn child was named by the King. Upon hearing the name given by the King, the baby started to cry out loud. Madālasā sings this beautiful lullaby to pacify the child.
